${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:NumbThePain.NAME: Numb The Pain
${modID}:NumbThePain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Shuffle a Dazed into your discard pile.

${modID}:CockyHelmet.NAME: Cocky Helmet
${modID}:CockyHelmet.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block each turn. Gain !M! Thorns.

${modID}:SpikyShield.NAME: Spiky Shield
${modID}:SpikyShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

${modID}:Donnel.NAME: Donnel
${modID}:Donnel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, permanently increase this card's damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FinalForm.NAME: Final Form
${modID}:FinalForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Ethereal.

${modID}:AnotherDrink.NAME: Another Drink
${modID}:AnotherDrink.DESCRIPTION: Gain a potion. Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Burp.NAME: Burp
${modID}:Burp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies whenever a card is exhausted.

${modID}:SuckerPunch.NAME: Sucker Punch
${modID}:SuckerPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card and gain [E] but only works if the enemy intends to attack.

${modID}:PapaRoach.NAME: Papa Roach
${modID}:PapaRoach.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Gains !M! Damage for the rest of combat after first use.
${modID}:PapaRoach.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! Damage. Gains !M! Damage for the rest of combat after first use.

${modID}:KingsShield.NAME: King's Shield
${modID}:KingsShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If the enemy intends to attack, inflict !M! Weak.

${modID}:AcidArmor.NAME: Acid Armor
${modID}:AcidArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BoobooKeys.NAME: Booboo Keys
${modID}:BoobooKeys.DESCRIPTION: Enemy gains 1 Strength and !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:BoobooKeys.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy gains 1 Strength and !M! Vulnerable twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AggronMaid.NAME: Aggron Maid
${modID}:AggronMaid.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! more cards next turn.

${modID}:SoBrave.NAME: So Brave
${modID}:SoBrave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Channel 1 ${modID}:Brave orb.

${modID}:FocusBlast.NAME: Focus Blast
${modID}:FocusBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Has a 30% of missing.

${modID}:Metronome.NAME: Metronome
${modID}:Metronome.DESCRIPTION: Add  a random card to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:NewChamp.NAME: New Champ!
${modID}:NewChamp.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Remove all orbs. Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:NewChamp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Evoke all orbs. Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Scald.NAME: Scald
${modID}:Scald.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Inflict !M! Weak and Vulnerable.

${modID}:RepeatingDigits.NAME: Check em!
${modID}:RepeatingDigits.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and deal !D! damage X times.

${modID}:Funbro.NAME: Funbro
${modID}:Funbro.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Retain your hand and block this turn.

${modID}:Dogars.NAME: D O G A R S

${modID}:FemaleOnly.NAME: Female Only
${modID}:FemaleOnly.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

${modID}:Button.NAME: Button
${modID}:Button.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain 1 Vulnerable. Shuffle this back into your draw pile but it deals !M! more damage this combat.

${modID}:DaysInIndia.NAME: 184 Days In India
${modID}:DaysInIndia.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Gain !B! Block. Deal !D! damage. When Retained, increase damage by !M! this combat.

${modID}:Greed.NAME: Greed
${modID}:Greed.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 extra card per turn. Gain !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Shreckle.NAME: Shreckle
${modID}:Shreckle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength each turn. Lose 1 Dexterity each turn.

${modID}:FoulPlay.NAME: Foul Play
${modID}:FoulPlay.DESCRIPTION: Temporarily gain the enemy's Strength this turn. Deal !D! Damage.

${modID}:Paraflinch.NAME: Paraflinch
${modID}:Paraflinch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If you have any debuffs draw a card and gain [E].

${modID}:SolidSuggester.NAME: Solid Suggester
${modID}:SolidSuggester.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies. NL Costs !M! for the rest of combat after taking damage.

${modID}:PukeBlood.NAME: Puke Blood
${modID}:PukeBlood.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP. Inflict !M! Poison. Channel a ${modID}:Koffing.

${modID}:Hellfrog.NAME: Hellfrog
${modID}:Hellfrog.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust a card from your hand at random.
${modID}:Hellfrog.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies. Choose a card to Exhaust from your hand.

${modID}:ProudOfItsPower.NAME: Stand Proud
${modID}:ProudOfItsPower.DESCRIPTION: When you take damage from your own card or when you get debuffed, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:OUStall.NAME: OU Stall
${modID}:OUStall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Channel a ${modID}:Koffing. NL Add a card from your discard pile to the top of your deck.

${modID}:ArceusRuse.NAME: Arceus-Ruse
${modID}:ArceusRuse.DESCRIPTION: All enemies lose !M! Strength and gain !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Fug.NAME: Fug
${modID}:Fug.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies. Gain !M! Frail.

${modID}:Reshiram.NAME: Lubby Chudder
${modID}:Reshiram.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage !M! times. Add 1 Burn to your hand.

${modID}:GigaImpact.NAME: Giga Impact
${modID}:GigaImpact.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Cannot attack next turn.

${modID}:Shitmons.NAME: Shitmons
${modID}:Shitmons.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn add a random card to your hand.
${modID}:Shitmons.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn add a random card to your hand.

${modID}:PrepareForTrouble.NAME: Philly Greeting
${modID}:PrepareForTrouble.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !M! Shiv to your hand.
${modID}:PrepareForTrouble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !M! Shivs to your hand.

${modID}:Dig.NAME: Dig
${modID}:Dig.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Gain 1 Weak and 1 Frail.

${modID}:BoltBeam.NAME: Bolt-Beam
${modID}:BoltBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Channel 1 Lightning. NL Deal !D! damage. Channel 1 Frost.

${modID}:KillAllNerds.NAME: KillAllNerds.exe
${modID}:KillAllNerds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Take !M! damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Punishment.NAME: Punishment
${modID}:Punishment.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Then deal !${modID}:secondary_damage! damage for each buff the target has.

${modID}:DragonThatClouds.NAME: Dragon Clouding
${modID}:DragonThatClouds.DESCRIPTION: This turn gain !B! Block whenever you exhaust a card. Exhaust up to !M! cards in your hand.

${modID}:Adaptability.NAME: Adaptability
${modID}:Adaptability.DESCRIPTION: When you take damage from your own card or when you get debuffed, draw !M! card.
${modID}:Adaptability.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you take damage from your own card or when you get debuffed, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Standoff.NAME: Standoff
${modID}:Standoff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength for each enemy that intends to attack. NL Exhaust.
